scenes.title: Graveyard Intro
scenes.text: You arrive in a quiet field. Across a small creek lies a rusted iron gate. Behind it rows upon rows of ancient tombstones.

scenes.title: Graveyard Gate
scenes.text: The gate creeks as you push it aside. Sunset is fading quickly as you enter the graveyard. You begin to feel a chill

scenes.title: Creek bed
scenes.text: On second thought, the graveyard sounds like a super bad idea. You follow the creek downstream. Walking into the sunset, with the graveyard at your back, the world feels a little brighter
